feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Nav update conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16546
  • Add Endpoint and EndpointGroup mechanism for specifying API routes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16569
  • Fix/banner theme adherence by @Angekarara in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16564
  • Fix Google Sheet datasource creation. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16574
  • Dev & pro migration conflicts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16458

New Contributors

  • @Angekarara made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16564

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.16...3.13.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add clear row selection for gridblock by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16580

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.17...3.13.18

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BUDI-9355] Bulk add existing users to groups via csv upload by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16528

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.18...3.13.19

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Introduce a suite of tests that test upgrading between Budibase versions. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16576
  • Remove a difficult-to-read nested ternary. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16590
  • Migration processor for corrupted prod apps by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16589

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.19...3.13.20

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.21
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix migration issues by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16592

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.20...3.13.21
